text:
Had this idea then proceeded to find it’s been requested since 2018, thought I’d reflag it.

Add Revision History for Forms

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-Revision-History-for-Forms-GDPR-Requirement/idc-p/802162#M145253>
Would be great if we get a custom class option in "?developer mode=true"
It will be cool to have the possibility to add custom classes to native modules
